__e: Do you think Rex is the right guy for my first time?

Well... Well, Rex is at home... and that's where you should be.
Rex, old boy, it's time you joined the party.
Rex, the truth is, with the kids gone, I'll be all by myself in this house for the first time in 17 years.
I know, Rex, that's what I was thinking.

Rex and I took a vacation there. Right before the kids were born.
It's true Rex and I did not have the perfect marriage, but for 18 years I tried my very best, and for that I am entitled to your respect.
I keep seeing that look on Rex's face, and then him taking off like that.
It's true Rex and I did not have the perfect marriage, but for 18 years I tried my very best, and for that I am entitled to your respect.
I told him to bail on you that night at Rex's and he said, "No."
- I have a name for him. Rex, the walkie-talkie robot man.
